issues.description: The template’s addGuestStudents method signature includes an extra boolean parameter (validateInput) that is neither described in the problem statement nor present in the solution, causing a parameter mismatch and likely test failures.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the template’s method signature to public void addGuestStudents(int numberOfNewGuestStudents) (remove the boolean parameter) so it matches the specification in the problem statement and the solution implementation.

issues.description: The template repository adds an extra boolean parameter (`validateInput`) to the addGuestStudents method signature, whereas the problem statement and solution expect a single-parameter method addGuestStudents(int). This mismatch will confuse students when implementing and testing the method.
issues.suggested_fix: Remove the boolean parameter from the template's addGuestStudents method so it matches the problem statement and solution: public void addGuestStudents(int numberOfNewGuestStudents).
